projects.name: MimicFox
projects.description: Text-to-Speech extension for Firefox on Linux, enabling read aloud functionality using Mycroft's mimic

projects.name: Dark Scroll
projects.description: Firefox extension that implements a global dark scrollbar theme

projects.name: Tower Tumbles
projects.description: An absurd game where you play as a Tower running away from planes trying to crash into you

projects.name: Inflatables Demo
projects.description: A multiplayer physics game where players control characters made of inflatable primitive shapes. Players use needles to strategically pop opponents' body parts, creating dynamic gameplay as character mobility changes with each deflation.

projects.name: Cool Maze Game
projects.description: A multiplayer maze race with funky vector graphics. What makes it even more trippy is when you hit a translucent wall; either the whole screen goes psychedelic, or your keys get jumbled up and mess with your navigation.

achievements.name: Full Stack Developer
achievements.description: Proficient in both frontend and backend technologies
